about_the_game:
LEAGUE OF MAIDENS® STANDARD EDITION:


This package includes the following items.

  • Exclusive Sexy Bath Robe Outfit Skin
  • 2 Unlocked Inventory Rows
  • 2 Unlocked Character Slots

This content required League of Maidens® the free base game for use.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, General Mature Content. Nude Character Customization, Nude Characters in game, Nude Showering and Nude Posing featured in Pose3D.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7970 3GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online play and product activation

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770/AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB/AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB or better

  • Storage: 10 GB available space
